articles.title: Lyon manager Peter Bosz thinks he’s already got one over West Ham before huge Europa League clash - Hammers News - West Ham United FC
articles.description: Lyon manager Peter Bosz has suggested that he has already got one up on West Ham ahead of Thursday's huge Europa League clash.
articles.content:
Lyon manager Peter Bosz has suggested that he has already got one up on West Ham ahead of Thursdays huge Europa League clash at the London Stadium.

articles.title: Man Utd squad picks a side after Ralf Rangnick "killed" Marcus Rashford with decision - The Mirror
articles.description: Marcus Rashford was expected to lead the line against Leicester City, given he is the only match-fit out and out forward at Man United, but Ralf Rangnick benched him
articles.content:
Ralf Rangnick's decision to name Marcus Rashford on the bench despite not starting another striker in Manchester United's 1-1 draw with Leicester City reportedly left the dressing room baffled.
